title: Stop being toxic in ARURF
body: This is why we can't have nice things. It's supposed to be a ridiculous clown fiesta where you have fun and some picks are just plain superior to others. Calm down.

replies.body:
i played about 4 or 5 games tonight. in 2 of them, the entire enemy team was extremely rude and toxic when they won the game. in another there was a toxic person on the enemy team as you would have one in a normal game, making the game unfun for them but all in all the game wasn't that bad.

What amazes me is that no one was being toxic when they lost. it was the people who won. their entire team would start saying "gg ez" and "ez game noobs" and on and on. In one game one of the guys called everyone on our team a "ni**er" in the post game chat for no reason. he won the game. his team went on about how we left the base undefended and we were noobs when 3 ad champions tp'd to a minion when we only had 1 tower left and the nexus.

This is completely ridiculous. and this shit happened in the blood moon event as well and yet i haven't seen a single instant feedback response in my client yet. And at this completely absurd level of toxicity i should see at least one.
That's because nine to twelve year old kids think insulting people is fun, and urf is about fun right. This game needs an age verification.
Actually, 99% of people who use the word "kid" are kids themselves, thinking they were mature.
you do realize the proper term for someone under 13 is Child correct, that's english, just like calling a two year old a toddler is not an insult; its an adjective.

ye if this would be your english school class.
but thats not the case here.
its lol.

and in lol, he is right. most people who use that word are kids themselves,
and the fact that u are arguing against that just proves his point.

literally handing over the proof.

How can you literally hand over proof in a fictitious argument? Let's have a quick reading comprehension check!
> That's because nine to twelve-year-old kids think insulting people is fun, and urf is about fun right. This game needs an age verification.

That's, a conjunction of That and Is, because nine to twelve year old kids, identifying the age of children who are between nine to twelve year olds, think insulting people is fun. Urf is about fun right? This game needs an age verification.

So explain to me literally where I called the people who are toxic in urf kids instead of point out the fact that literal children play this game and respond to people by insulting them, by the way that is how you use the word literal, to express something that is actually as is being displayed not to express the figurative action of having proof given for a non-corporeal argument. Your turn

Get schooled
and thats why he said "most people who say "kid", are kids themselves".

Stop being an sjw theres this button you know what its called? Say it with me..

Mute.

Or just don't be a asshat....... I mean seriously.   Just don't.


No one ever got banned for being polite.   No one ever got banned for being a good sportsman.  

I have however seen people thrown out of every type of establishment you can think of for being a jerk.
By the time you mute someone the toxicity had already happened. Still deserves a report
too many lieberal special snowflakes play this game my friend :( don't you know words hurt!!
Mute all the players!... yeah no
I'm a conservative, but I value politeness.  I think the requirements for the "honorable opponent" should really be more emphasized.  "Humble in victory" and "graceful in defeat."
I've been having a jolly good time, so far. been laughing every game regardless of if we win or lose.
Pretty fun when you get all shit champs and the enemy team gets Fiora, Eve, Shaco, Wukong, Fizz

It's sad that there are people like this, but this is the reason why we have a report button. Especially in these types of game mode use it when people are toxic. They think that just because it's a joke game mode Riot doesn't take it seriously when that cannot be farther from the truth.
I guess my anger just translates into the game from champ select cause I get pissed this is random, and actually wanted to play Urgot...

There's no reason to be toxic in any mode, but not being toxic in rotating game modes is a good place to start!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Dude, we can't get people to stop being toxic in normals, you think we can get them to do it in URF of all things?

It's a trash mode.  Regular URF was great.  No one aside from a few morons complained about OP heroes and how unbalanced it was if you didn't pick one.  Now it's the exact same thing except you don't get to choose who you get to play to counter their OP heroes while you have a worthless URF-ruleset hero like Soraka on your team.

This is coming from someone that plays only ARAM too. 

ARURF is far more stompy than any other mode I've ever played.
Are you kidding me? I stomped a game as soraka with a nami
actually i stomped face with my raka. that silence on a ~4 sec cd? yes pls {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=ATastyDessert,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xFH24AP0,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2017-02-25T12:48:16.700+0000)
>
> It's a trash mode.  Regular URF was great.  No one aside from a few morons complained about OP heroes and how unbalanced it was if you didn't pick one.  




**...................HAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA**
Take out the "in ARURF" and I agree 100% with that title.

I played a game of ARURF yesterday, and I quote:

"/all report syndra ty"
"useless jhin"
"STOP FEEDING!!"
"/all report my team

This came from a 4/7/1 Shen who almost never ulted.

Come on, people! Enjoy the fun mode for what it is!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Also, stop dodging just because you get something you don't like... It's not the end of the world, even if you fail miserably. I for one won't care.
Give us back real urf and we will. Or at least I will.

> [{quoted}](name=Deiformis Ira,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xFH24AP0,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-02-25T03:12:57.656+0000)
>
> Give us back real urf and we will. Or at least I will.

YES!

I played with a salty azir who was feeding like crazy and yelling at everyone saying they all sucked and he was tilted by how much everyone sucked and I just had to mute him. It's freakin urf mode. WTF did people expect in this mode? I laugh almost every game because it's so absurd and I'm 99% sure that's what Riot intended. People to laugh at how ridiculous the game mode is.

This is especially Ironic becuase Azir's really good in URF.

Atk speed buffs are doubled for ranged, so I only have to buy half the atk speed items and then go straight damage.

Huh. I've played 20-ish games across my accounts and I'm yet to see a single toxic person. It's been shockingly un-toxic in fact. Nobody is taking it seriously, which is how it's supposed to be. Sorry to hear that your experience wasn't the same.
People  take this mode more seriously than ranked I'm afraid. I actually hate it for this reason, the first urf was fun but once a meta began developing, that was the end of any fun this mode had.

People are shit, simple as that.
Sad to say, really, but it get more and more true each passing day it seems.
But it does make those that are not shit all the better to see.

It has been a blast.  I had someone about to kill me.  I was totally dead.  So I hit teleport to the tower right next to me and he ran. He thought someone was coming to get him.   HAHAHA!!  
Stole one in a base race.  I wish I could play more but too many things to do this weekend.

I got called a "weeb king" while playing ekko.

Good times...
Isn't that a compliment? :D
I mean I dunno about you, but I didn't mind it at all
Only toxic thing ive noticed in urf is there is no trap limit... Thanks riot...

I just LOL at idiots who rage in a mode that doesn't matter at all which never really get recorded, best part is when they call me a noob at the game then when you check their history it's either they are bronze/silver or who duo main in Solo Q to climb the ladder.
I wish it drew from the whole champion pool rather than just owned champions. I see a lot of the same thing every game.
I played against a salty Riven that flamed me because we had a Morgana...

For some reason people feel the need to be a lot ruder then necessary then usual.
Like sure, it's a goofy gamemode but don't be a dick about it.

THIS. I've played 8 games so far, and in 4 of them i've been told to KYS. I blame riots idiot idea to make this ARAM style making everyone toxic as hell cause they don't get to play who they want to play.
Right? 'Tis supposed to be fun. :\

I was just playing a game with people who decided to 3 man bot like w.e and the person top lane kept pinging and asking for help and i commented on it also not being rude or anything and i got flamed for the rest of the game because i said "I still like to win". They were then telling the enemy team i was being toxic and in the end even the Kat who i stood up for was flaming me also.. its hard to have fun when people act like little unsupervised children.

> [{quoted}](name=I Feed Krugs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xFH24AP0,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-25T01:05:28.450+0000)
>
> This is why we can&#039;t have nice things. It&#039;s supposed to be a ridiculous clown fiesta where you have fun and some picks are just plain superior to others. Calm down.

I played some ARURF with some of my lower Elo  buddies who are all real life Friends and rank doesn't matter cuz it's URF, I did well I thought and so did my friends ESP since we built crazy items and such, one game I get flamed for no reason (not talking in chat cuz we used discord) but our random 2 guy who were duped didn't think I played aswell as they "expected a diamond player" to play. Calling me names and all sorts of stuff, and TBH I did play well I thought with 22~ kills on velkoz and highest dmg cuz vel is broken af lol deaths like 6-9 I don't recall exactly but like why are people so toxic omg I know it's worse I'm the silver range from what I was told. We won that game and they both went to the /all "GG SO EASy" is it like a curse? If you're trash do you gotta bring us all down to? And I don't mean trash at league I mean trash as a person with their toxic attitude. League skill doesn't matter in URF jury have fun

 I ranted my bad, but I'm upset cause it ruins the experience for my friends who are too naive to mute people lol

That's one of the reasons why I don't like ARURF...some people seem to think it's okay to be toxic there. Besides that the gamemode is dead for me already...won 6 out of 8 games, but each game felt so incredibly stupid, it's kinda sad.

My first game was camillie and pretty much the enemy team had a jax and shyvanna so couldn't fight so i just went afk farmed in the jungle. I had fun cause i picked up my phone and started watching a video while i was farming. we ended up winning cause zed. and i did nothing for 15min. i
